title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Skills: Language Competency Enhancement Through Online Service Learning: Engagement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and experience in the service industry
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners complete service scenario-based projects in the target language (foreign language or Korean) using online collaboration tools.
Learners improve language communication competencies by participating in at least 80% of interactive activities (discussions, feedback, peer assessments) provided on digital platforms.

On online platforms (e.g., Virtual Patient Case), learners can analyze ≥8 patient-centered scenarios (e.g., chronic disease management, emergency response), develop three-stage problem-solving strategies (cause analysis → alternative establishment → execution plan) per scenario, and submit reports scoring ≥4/5 in peer/expert feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
